#summary Describes the files and structure of a GWT project.

=Project Structure=

[DevGuideDirectoriesPackageConventions Directories/Package conventions]
GWT projects are built from a recommended package layout.

[DevGuideModules Modules]
Modules are XML files that contain settings related to your application or library.

[DevGuideHostPage HTML Host Pages]
A host page is an HTML document that includes a GWT module.
